title: Network warning.
body:
I keep getting 'Network warning', 'You have been disconnected' after champ select during loading.
It keeps closing my game. It only allows me to reconnect  after everyone on both teams has connected and the match has started.

replies.body: I'd like to know how to contact you 1:1.

> [{quoted}](name=KOR JINX,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EQ4Bjhiy,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-09-07T05:09:09.309+0000)
>
> I'd like to know how to contact you 1:1.

Why do you know how to fix it?

my mail  : ldk4511@naver.com  

그리고 나는 북미서버에 잃어버린 계정 비밀번호를 찾고싶어요.., 도와주실수있나요?

아이디명:날강도
I was having the same issues until I disabled Windows Firewall and Defender. I hope this helps someone!

> [{quoted}](name=Akira35965,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EQ4Bjhiy,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-09-10T02:15:00.742+0000)
>
> I was having the same issues until I disabled Windows Firewall and Defender. I hope this helps someone!

How did you do that? That might work because I've had the problem when it recently updated
Yeah ive been having same problem im not able to load back in untill everyone else is already in game.

Your router might be losing it's connection with our servers while it's trying to put you into the game. Let's trying fixing this with the basics first by going through the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Be sure to test those in a custom match and let me know if nothing seems to help!
This is the 3rd time it's happened to me and of course its the days before the star guardian skins come out. FML
bumping this cause I have the same problem, made a post about it and didn't get any actual help.
